metadata.title: ReversingLabs-CheckQuota
metadata.description: This playbook will check your ReversingLabs TitaniumCloud API quota and provide usage details. To be used in conjunction with the ReversingLabs-CapabilitiesOverview workbook.
Name of the playbook (Logic Apps resources) which will be created
Username used to authenticate to ReversingLabs TitaniumCloud API
Password used for authenticating to ReversingLabs TitaniumCloud API

runError.message: Playbook run failed - error checking RLAPI connectivity

properties.description: [format('Role required for {0} to access secrets in {1}', parameters('PlaybookName'), variables('keyVaultName'))]
